main.name: Marie Lenac
main.description: Gearing up to graduate and lift off my career change into the tech space, I am ready to be a part of the action!
main.bio: I am a tenacious and dynamic individual looking for new opportunities and career advancement. I'm very process focused and I have been applying that to various roles in the sales & sales ops space. I have a knack for creative problem solving and I'm committed to sustainability and long term progress. Helping others is something that gives me fulfillment in life and at work, I want to foster a sense of teamwork and collaboration wherever I go.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
